pages.text: $(bold)Breakfalls$() are skills to protect us from impact of landing.$(br)By this mod, you can do $(bold)Roll$() and $(bold)Safety Tap$().

pages.title: Roll
pages.text: $(bold)Roll$() is one of the Breakfalls. It change an impact of landing into energy of rolling.$(br2)This is sometimes misunderstood, but the $(italic)Roll$() of parkour is landing technique, so ParCool's roll is also used only when you land.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(list)Land while you press forward or backward movement key and Breakfall Key$(br)(Normally itâ€™s mapped to R)

pages.title: Safety Tap
pages.text: $(bold)Safety Tap$() is one of the Breakfalls. It absorb an impact by bending your legs.$(br2)By the way how can Steve bend his legs?
